hero.kicker_text: Turn quiet videos and audio into loud, clear sound
hero.subtitle: Increase Volume – Sound Boost is your dedicated iPhone volume booster. Fix quiet screen recordings, podcasts, and videos in seconds with clean, powerful sound and rich bass.

sections.audience_aria: Who it's for and why people love it

feature_card.description: Increase Volume – Sound Boost takes any audio or video on your iPhone and makes it dramatically louder while keeping it clear and easy to understand. No confusing controls, no editing skills required.
feature_card.rating_1_text: for boosting quiet videos and audio

steps_card.title: Boosting your audio is this simple.
steps_card.step_1: Import a video, song, or recording — or start directly from the Photos app.
steps_card.step_2: Drag the boost slider to add loudness, clarity, and bass in real time.
steps_card.step_3: Save the boosted file back to your device and share it anywhere.
steps_card.label: Ideal for: screen recordings, TikTok/Reels clips, interviews, voice memos, and more.

audience_card.title: If your iPhone volume isn't enough, it is.
audience_card.item_1: People who constantly max out volume but still can't hear.
audience_card.item_2: Creators who need loud, clear audio for social videos.
audience_card.item_3: Anyone fixing quiet screen recordings and tutorials.
audience_card.item_4: Listeners boosting podcasts, lectures, or voice notes.

testimonial_card.title: "Works good and it's simple." – App Store review
testimonial_card.paragraph_1: Increase Volume is designed to get out of your way. Open, boost, save, done — with smart defaults and a clean layout that feels native to iPhone.
testimonial_card.paragraph_2: Under the hood, it's a powerful volume booster and sound enhancer that keeps your audio punchy instead of distorted.

software_application.name: Increase Volume – Sound Boost
software_application.description: Make any audio or video louder on iPhone with clear sound, powerful bass, and quick editing.

howto.name: How to boost audio on iPhone
howto.description: Import audio or video, boost the volume, and save the louder file back to your device.

step.name: Import a file
step.text: Import a video, song, or recording — or start directly from the Photos app.

step.name: Boost the volume
step.text: Drag the boost slider to add loudness, clarity, and bass in real time.

step.name: Save and share
step.text: Save the boosted file back to your device and share it anywhere.

mainEntity.name: Does Increase Volume work for videos and audio?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. You can boost both video and audio files, including screen recordings, podcasts, and voice notes.

mainEntity.name: Is the boosted file saved on my iPhone?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. After boosting, you can save the louder file back to your device and share it anywhere.
